definition: WordNet category: noun, verb, adjective or adverb
opposite_reasoning: LexiconCategory is a highly specialized meta-linguistic concept without a clear antonym. Among the candidates, PhysicalObject provides the strongest practical opposition for Fisher-LDA: it represents the abstract/concrete divide, has maximum availability in both WordNet and SUMO, and creates a meaningful semantic axis. While not a perfect opposition, it establishes a clear boundary between abstract linguistic classification systems and concrete material entities. This is more reliable than NonLinguisticEntity (lower availability, more abstract) and more semantically distant than Process or SemanticContent.
